about_the_game:
Survive a Dystopian AI-Controlled World

In a dark future ruled by powerful AI corporations, you are a Breacher. Your mission is simple yet deadly: infiltrate secure facilities, steal valuable data, and sabotage the AI’s grip on humanity. Work alone or team up with friends in this intense co-op survival experience.

4-Player Cooperative

Team up with up to three friends to take on dangerous, high-stakes missions. Coordinate strategies, share resources, and combine perks to outsmart the AI’s adaptive defenses. Together, you’ll overcome challenges no one could face alone.

Infinite Replayability

Every mission is a new experience. Procedurally generated environments, evolving threats, and adaptive AI ensure that no two playthroughs are ever the same. Plan carefully, or face the consequences.

Dual-World Gameplay

Navigate both the physical world and a digital matrix-like realm. Each reality offers unique puzzles, challenges, and opportunities that impact the other. Use strategy to manipulate these interconnected dimensions and gain the upper hand.

Customize and Upgrade

Progression is the key to survival. Gather data and special schematics during missions to unlock powerful perks, enhance your abilities, and unlock essential tools.

Unlimited Perk Combinations

Take control of your progression with the Byte Web. Unlock and combine perks from four categories: Hacker, Infiltrator, Engineer, and Decryptor - to create a loadout tailored to your strategy. The possibilities are endless.

Rise After Death

When you fall, the Resurgence Chip activates. Return in a new form with unique abilities to assist your team or disrupt AI systems. Even in death, you remain vital to the mission.

Feel the Tension

Every sound, flicker, and shadow is designed to immerse you in constant tension. The AI is always watching, and danger lurks around every corner. Can you outsmart it?

short_description: Sci-fi co-op survival horror in a dystopian future ruled by AI corporations. Infiltrate secure facilities, steal valuable data, and navigate both real and digital worlds. Face dynamic challenges, work together, and outsmart powerful AI defenses. Will you survive the breach?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
